name: Prior to incorporating any Earth or Rock Fill Material into the Works, the Contractor shall submit stockpile or source tests results as specified in Appendix A which demonstrate the source meets the specified material requirements.
Rock Fill shall be sourced from a TMR regsitered quarry or other suitable source and shall comply with the properties states in Table 14.2.3.
The foundation under rock fill shall be treated and shaped to maintain drainage and so erosion of the foundation will not occur.

Rock fill shall be placed and spread in such a way to avoid segregation and contamination with foreign material. The uncompacted Rock Fill layer thickness must not exceed the thickness given in Table 15.4
Compact the Rock Fill using the mechanical interlock method of construction as per Clause 15.4
Embankments constructed to the shapes, zones and other requirements shown on the drawings or as otherwise specified.
Geotextile placed at interchange between compaction methods
The ground surface on which embankments are to be constructed shall be stepped in accordance with the requirements of Cl14.3.3
The max thickness of an uncompacted layer shall be as per Table 15.4.
Each layer rolled until the rolled surfaces do not exhibit any permanent deformation, rutting, yielding, signs of distress or instability.
Project Manager Verify that the Above has been Constructed according to Specification
Client Verify that the Above has been Constructed according to Specification
Final Sign Offs (to be completed at closure of Lot)
